column1:
How can I create a Poll?|

To create a new Poll, please follow the steps below:
1. Click on &ldquo
column3:
from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Go to &ldquo
column5:
section.
3. Fill the basic details for your Poll.
4. When you are done, click on &ldquo

column1:
Can I edit my Poll?|

No, you are not allowed to edit your Poll. You can only change the privacy for your Poll by using &ldquo

How can I delete my Poll?|

You can delete your Poll by using &ldquo

Who all can see my Poll?|

You can choose who all can see your Poll while creating your Poll, by choosing the appropriate option for the &ldquo
column3: field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the &ldquo

column1:
Who all can comment on my Poll?|

You can choose who all can comment your Poll while creating your Poll, by choosing the appropriate option for the &ldquo
column3: field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the &ldquo
